title: 1081 190 "The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral!"Transliteration: "Sekai ga Moeru! Kaigun Taishō Shūrai!" (Japanese:世界が燃える！海軍大将襲来！) Sho Matsui Hitoshi Tanaka Shigefumi Shingaki October 29, 2023(2023-10-29)
transformers_text: 1081 190 The World Will Burn The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral Transliteration Se kai ga Moe ru Kai gun Taish Sh rai Japanese Sho Matsui Hitoshi Tanaka S hig ef umi Shin gaki October 29 2023 2023 10 29 The Red Hair Pirates near the borders of Wa no where Shanks and his crew debate seeing Luffy again Though everyone but Yas opp wishes to reunite Shanks recalls stealing the Gum Gum Fruit from CP 9 and how Luffy accidentally ate it Choosing not to meet him Shanks instead resolves to confront Bartolomeo for disrespecting his flag and declares it's time to go after the One Piece Meanwhile Admiral Ryo ku gyu infiltrates Wa no confronting the A kaz aya Nine and Shinobu near the Flower Capital Proclaiming the Celestial Dragons as gods he transforms into a massive wooden go lem using his Woods Woods Fruit powers effortlessly deflecting their attacks Believing Wa no's independence from the World Government makes its citizens expendable he begins his assault until Yamato arrives to help At Marine Headquarters Fleet Admiral S a kazuki meets with Ki zar u and Kuro uma to discuss the Revolutionary Army's assault on Marie jo is where S abo allegedly assassinated Nefertari Cobra Viv i vanished and Kuma was freed The nobles are also deliberating Saint M jos gard's punishment for aiding an unknown attacker against Saint Char los S abo's deeds make him a worldwide hero dubbed the Flame Emperor Ki zar u notes that Luffy's rise as an Emperor only amplifies S abo's influence Back in Wa no Momo no suke struggling to use flame breath confronts Ryo ku gyu but is captured Despite his injuries he insists Yamato stay back determined to defend Wa no without outside help
tf_idf_text: world burn onslaught navy admiral transliteration kai moe kai gun taish rai japanese sho matsui hitoshi tanaka hig umi shin gaki october red hair pirate near border shank crew debate see luffy though everyone yas opp wish reunite shank recall steal gum gum fruit luffy accidentally ate choose not meet shank instead resolve confront bartolomeo disrespect flag declares time one piece meanwhile admiral ryo gyu infiltrate confront kaz aya nine shinobu near flower capital proclaim celestial dragon god transforms massive wooden lem use wood wood fruit power effortlessly deflect attack believe nos independence world government make citizen expendable begin assault yamato arrives help marine headquarters fleet admiral kazuki meet zar kuro uma discus revolutionary army assault marie abo allegedly assassinated nefertari cobra viv vanish kuma free noble also deliberate saint jos gards punishment aid unknown attacker saint char los abos deed make worldwide hero dub flame emperor zar note luffys rise emperor amplifies abos influence back momo suke struggle use flame breath confronts ryo gyu capture despite injury insist yamato stay back determine defend without outside help
